thread.title: I can't imagine a better view of New York City!
thread.title_full: I can't imagine a better view of New York City! - Review of Dumont NYC-an Affinia hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: wonworld
title: I can't imagine a better view of New York City!
text:
From the view to the spaciousness of the room, we were ready to move in for good. The kitchen looked great for whatever you would need, the bathroom was fine, and the view, did I mention the view?! You can't know from the street what awaits in this hotel. It's in an easy area to access and is surrounded by good restaurants and stores.
The bed was incredibly comfortable and the lighting was very good - something not always done well in hotel rooms. We had a quiet and comfortable night's sleep and would love to come back again.
The small guest entrance manages to host an array of services, including a snack area and a daily offering of wine for guests.
Management is responsive. It's all you need in a hotel.
Room Tip: 3404 was stunning. See more room tips Green Features: Happily, they use high-quality soap, shampoo, and conditioner, and dispense it from environmentally wonderful dispensers. No waste.
